title: 83/359/EEC: Commission Decision of 11 July 1983 establishing that the apparatus described as 'Microcal - Differential Scanning Calorimeter, model MC-1' may be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 11 July 1983
establishing that the apparatus described as 'Microcal - Differential Scanning Calorimeter, model MC-1' may be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
(83/359/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The apparatus described as 'Microcal - Differential Scanning Calorimeter, model MC-1', which is the subject of an application by Italy of 21 December 1982, may be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 11 July 1983.
For the Commission
Karl-Heinz NARJES
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 184, 15. 7. 1975, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 74, 18. 3. 1982, p. 4.
